name: FIX
overview:
FIX is a development company committed to creating innovative systems to help traditional media utilize the internet. Among its chief products are PiT ENTRY and Kakaritsuke Dr.

PiT ENTRY is a real time phone based TV participation system. It allows Television companies to easily produce a real-time poll in a program. Viewers can see their responses reflected on the program they are watching. With the ability to produce graphs with animation elements, it also adds visual excitement to the screen. PiT ENTRY is a low cost system that raises viewer retention and participation by more directly connecting the viewers with the TV program.

Kakaritsuke Dr. (Personal Doctor) is a CRM system that supports private medical practices. It starts with an appointment reminder system, with print outs of relevant details on an appointment card including a cellphone readable QR code. From there, Kakaritsuke Dr. will also manage e-mails to patients, sending messages to their phones checking up on them once they have reached their home. A low cost and easy to use system to better connect and help doctors communicate with their patients.

FIX not only produces its own products, but also with client requests, acting as a development studio for internet enabled solutions.
